name: ペッカーラッシュ
description:
Take a break and have some fun!

◆Rules
Tap the right side of the screen to destroy buildings from the right, or tap the left side of the screen to destroy buildings from the left.
Destroy all the buildings while avoiding being crushed or blocked by them.
As time passes, your meter will start to deplete faster and faster.
You should hurry as fast as you can from the start.

◆How to Play
- Collect Characters
Pecker Rush features a lot of unique characters.
You can try your luck at the capsule machine or earn achievements to collect all the characters, completely free of charge.

-Climb the Leaderboard in Ranked Mode
Pecker Rush has a ranked mode that anyone can participate in for free.
Ranked mode is not affected by any character abilities so that everyone can compete fairly.
